summary.long: 2 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text: The elder, to the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth—and not I alone, but also all those who know the truth—
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: because of the truth that resides in us and will be with us forever.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Grace, mercy, peace will be with us from God the Father and from Jesus Christ the Son of the Father in truth and love.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I was very glad because I found some of your children walking in the truth, just as the Father commanded us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And now I ask you, lady (not as if I were writing a new commandment to you, but one that we have had from the beginning), that we should love one another.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this is love: that we walk according to his commandments. This is the commandment, just as you have heard from the beginning, so that you should walk in it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For many deceivers have gone out into the world, those who do not confess Jesus Christ coming in the flesh. This person is the deceiver and the antichrist!
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Watch yourselves that you do not lose what we have worked for, but receive a full reward.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Everyone who goes too far and does not remain in the teaching of Christ does not have God. The one who remains in the teaching—this person has both the Father and the Son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: If anyone comes to you and does not bring this teaching, do not receive him into your house and do not speak a greeting to him,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: because the one who speaks a greeting to him shares in his evil deeds.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Although I have many things to write to you, I do not want to do so by means of paper and ink, but I hope to be with you and to speak face to face, so that your joy may be complete.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The children of your elect sister greet you.
verses.speaker: Narrator
